column2: In  conclusion,  for  the  reasons  stated  above  I  hold  that  the  accused
appellant  had  failed  to  satisfy  this  court  on  any  ground  urged  on  his
behalf that a miscarriage of justice had occurred. Therefore I dismiss the

column1: appeal  of  the  accused-appellant  and  affirm

column2: sentence dated 16.02.2012 of the Learned High Court Judge of Colombo.
